title: How to Minimize Lag While Gaming Online

steps.headline: Optimize your game settings.
steps.description: All popular online games have network settings, its just a case of finding them. Search online for a guide to tweaking your game.

steps.headline: Configure your firewall properly.
steps.description: Badly configured firewalls can stop some packets getting through, causing loss or lag.

steps.headline: Speed up your PC.
steps.description: Slow PCs may not be able to keep up with the amount of packets. Close antivirus programs and other background applications.

steps.headline: Change your internet connection.
steps.description: It might just be that your ISP is not suited to gaming, or that your current package is just not fast enough.

steps.headline: Use a wired connection.
steps.description: If you have a laptop, simply connect your computer directly to your home router/modem via a Ethernet cable. This can help speed your internet speeds up by having you directly connected into the network instead of being a wireless signal which can slow down upload/download rates.

steps.headline: Make the gaming window smaller.
steps.description: The smaller the window, the higher the quality of the game.

text: Tweaking the settings Optimize your game settings. All popular online games have network settings, its just a case of finding them. Search online for a guide to tweaking your game.
